mapper.sql: menuid, menuname, menuurl, menulevel, parentmenuid, isdistribute, isdel, createuserid, createdatetime, updateuserid, updatedatetime
mapper.insert: insert into t_bd_menu (menuid, menuname, menuurl, menulevel, parentmenuid, isdistribute, isdel, createuserid, createdatetime, updateuserid, updatedatetime) values (#{menuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{menuname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{menuurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{menulevel,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{parentmenuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isdistribute,jdbcType=BIT}, #{isdel,jdbcType=BIT}, #{createuserid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateuserid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatedatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

menuid,
menuname,
menuurl,
menulevel,

isdistribute,
isdel,
createuserid,

updatedatetime,

mapper.update:
update t_bd_menu
menuname = #{menuname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
menuurl = #{menuurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
menulevel = #{menulevel,jdbcType=TINYINT},
parentmenuid = #{parentmenuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
isdistribute = #{isdistribute,jdbcType=BIT},
isdel = #{isdel,jdbcType=BIT},
createuserid = #{createuserid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createdatetime = #{createdatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
updateuserid = #{updateuserid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
updatedatetime = #{updatedatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where menuid = #{menuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update t_bd_menu set menuname = #{menuname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, menuurl = #{menuurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, menulevel = #{menulevel,jdbcType=TINYINT}, parentmenuid = #{parentmenuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, isdistribute = #{isdistribute,jdbcType=BIT}, isdel = #{isdel,jdbcType=BIT}, createuserid = #{createuserid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createdatetime = #{createdatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updateuserid = #{updateuserid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updatedatetime = #{updatedatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where menuid = #{menuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select menu.menuid, menu.menuname, menu.menuurl, menu.menulevel, menu.parentmenuid, menu.isdistribute, menu.isdel, menu.createuserid, menu.createdatetime, menu.updateuserid, menu.updatedatetime from t_bd_menu menu inner join r_auth_menu authMenu on menu.menuid = authMenu.menuid inner join t_bd_auth auth on auth.authid = authMenu.authid inner join r_role_auth roleAuth on roleAuth.authid = auth.authid inner join t_bd_role role on role.roleid = roleAuth.roleid inner join r_user_role userRole on userRole.roleid=role.roleid inner join t_bd_user u on u.userid = userRole.userid where u.userid = #{0}
